page.title: 03MARYKIRK SCHOOL JUNIORS
page.content: In the Junior room, 18 pupils aged 5 to 9 years are taught. There are 4 classes - primary 1 with five pupils, primary 2 with six pupils, primary 3 with three pupils and primary 4 with four pupils. Classes 1,2 and 3 go home at 3:00 p.m. and class 4 go home at 3:55 p.m. with the Seniors. On Monday primary 4 work with the art teacher. On Tuesday the remedial teacher comes to work with pupils from primary 3 to primary 6. The Juniors use the computer on Tuesday mornings. The P.E. teacher comes on Wednesday afternoon and singing and recorder lessons are taught on Thursday. The Juniors and Seniors join together in the G.P. Room for assembly on Friday.
